incident_updates.body: The issue impacting FreshBooks Payroll is now resolved. Thank you for your patience while we worked to fix the issue.

incidents.name: FreshBooks - Bank Reconciliation Issue for Some Users

incident_updates.body:
We have resolved the issue impacting Bank Reconciliation for some users. Thank you for your patience while we worked on a fix. 
Check back here for any further updates.

There’s currently an issue with Bank Reconciliation on FreshBooks. Some users may see a status of 'Waiting for transactions' for Bank Connections that have already completed their transaction import.  

We’ve identified the problem and are working to fix it; however, you may be unable to use Bank Reconciliation for some Bank Connections at this time. Please check back for further updates.
